statements: DELETE FROM geothermal_assets WHERE asset_location = 'California' AND asset_type = 'Well';
DELETE FROM geothermal_assets WHERE installation_date < '2022-01-01' AND asset_location = 'California';
DELETE FROM pumps WHERE pump_capacity < 500 AND pump_status = 'Active';
DELETE FROM pumps WHERE pump_capacity < 1000 AND pump_model = 'Model-A';
DELETE FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive Maintenance' AND maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM pipelines WHERE diameter > 3.0 AND material = 'Steel';
